text: A kogda oni razvyazali svoi pozhitki, to nashli, chto den'gi ikh za khleb byli im vozvrashcheny. Oni skazali: "Batyushka! Chego nam zhelat' boleye? Vot den'gi nashi, vozvrashchennyye nam. My dostanem propitaniye dlya nashikh semeystv; sokhranim nashego brata; i my budem v pribyli v'yukom odnogo verblyuda: etot v'yuk legkiy
